item.title: Grass verge between 133 and 131 Penhill Road, 25th June
item.description:

item.title: Recycling point in the car park behind the Post Office in Chislehurst the bins for plastics and cans are full, 25th June
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: Every time I visit the recycling point in the car park behind the Post Office in Chislehurst the bins for plastics and cans are full, and this was the case again yesterday, June 23rd. Can you tell me with what frequency these bins are emptied or replaced ? Perhaps you should add to the number of these bins in order to cater for the demand ? Thanks in advance for your kind attention to this matter. James Delaney • What action (if any) would you like us to take? Increase number of bins
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelaide Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbush & glass in the road along mera drive, 25th June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mera Drive, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 10 Englands Lane, 25th June
item.description:
Urgent works:The joining areas between camden grey slabs and the building owned glass pavement section are permitting water to leak through into basement flat below. We would like to lift up only one row of camden slabs for 1 to 2 days to seal off the joining areas and put slabs back. Most of pavement will be usable and no cost to camden
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, England's Lane, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thames Water Meter Manhole is filled with detritus, 25th June
item.description:
I have been informed by Thames Water that they are unable to take a meter reading for my property (192a High street) due to to detritus in the manhole on the pavement outside the property and that I need to contact the council to get this dealt with.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204 - 212, High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
